disclaimer.title: Accept Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: These steps involves the creation of a new account. The procedure consists of complex cryptographic operations that use a PASSPHRASE (a series of 15 random words) to create your UNIQUE ACCOUNT ADDRESS . This PASSPHRASE is extremely important and must be kept in safe place, since it's THE ONLY WAY to access your account. If you lose it you lose access to your account and your funds! The Foundation holds no responsibility for lost funds resulting from misplaced passphrases. The account passphrase and other vital information must be immediately saved and written down for your own safety. Make sure that you select the entire passphrase length before keeping it and check again your account address by logging in and compare the account address with the account address generated from this PASSPHRASE here before making your first transfer. Please proceed only if you understand and accept this disclaimer.

passphrase.title: Generate Passphrase
passphrase.note: Make sure that you keep the passphrase safe. If you lose your passphrase later on, your account can't be restored and all your funds will be lost. Write down your passphrase in the next step you will be asked to re-type it for confirmation.

confirm.title: Confirm PassPhrase and Sign In
confirm.note: Make sure that you keep the passphrase safe. If you lose your passphrase later on, your account can't be restored and all your funds will be lost. On your first sign in compare the account address shown in account details with the one you have written down during this new account creation and verify they match.

login.title: Please enter your Passphrase
login.note: Note: Every transaction will get signed locally and transmitted to a random node without revealing your wallet passphrase or private keys.

footer.content1: This app is owned by the

account.account-address-tooltip: This is your unique account ID.
account.confirmed-balance-tooltip: This is your confirmed account balance.
account.unconfirmed-balance-tooltip: This balance includes amounts on pending orders. For instance buy/sell orders.
account.effective-balance-tooltip: This balance is used for block generation calculation and shows only amounts with +1'440 confirmations. This is the balance used also for balance leasing.
account.earned-fees-balance-tooltip: This balance shows your accumulated block fee reward on generated blocks by this account.
account.balance-assets-tooltip: Assets balance based on the last trade for each asset this accounts holds.
account.balance-currencies-tooltip: Currencies balance based on the last trade for each currency this accounts holds.
account.balance-total-tooltip: The total balance including assets and currencies for this acocunt.
account.fiat-balance-account-tooltip: Fiat money equivalent, based on last completed trade on XIN exchange.
account.fiat-balance-assets-tooltip: Fiat money equivalent, based on last completed trade on XIN exchange.
account.fiat-balance-currencies-tooltip: Fiat money equivalent, based on last completed trade on XIN exchange.
account.fiat-balance-total-tooltip: Fiat money equivalent, based on last completed trade on XIN exchange.
account.account-name-tooltip: The public account name for this account.
account.account-description-tooltip: The public account description for this account.

send-xin.number-blocks-tooltip: Your transaction will be executed without further approvement after this number of blocks
send-xin.reference-full-hash-tooltip: Your transaction will be executed if this transaction hash is included into the blockchain
send-xin.secret-hash-tooltip: Your transaction will be executed if this secret hash is included into the blockchain
send-xin.recipient-tooltip: The recipient account to send token to.
send-xin.amount-tooltip: The amount you like to send to the recipient account.
send-xin.alias-connect-tooltip: Enter an alias connected to an account to get the account Id.
send-xin.open-bookmark-tooltip: Open your bookmarks to insert an account id
send-xin.message-field-tooltip: For message encryption the recipient public key needs to be known. This is not the case for accounts without any outbound transaction.
send-xin.public-key-field-tooltip: Additional security for brand new accounts without any outbound transaction and mandatory for encrypted messages to accounts without a known public key.

receive-xin.only-send-xin-text: Only send XIN to this address
receive-xin.other-digital-lable: Sending any other digital asset,including Bitcoin Cash and USDT, will result in permanent loss.
receive-xin.transaction-full-hash-tooltip: To claim a secret transaction you have to enter the transaction full hash.
receive-xin.revealed-secret-tooltip: Enter the secret from sender to claim your transaction before the transaction expires.

common.open-bookmark-tooltip: Open your bookmarks to insert an account id
common.alias-connect-tooltip: Enter an alias connected to an account to get the account Id.
